column5: Check this out! I found this on another site... all I can say is wow! http://www.signonsandiego.com/sports/outdo...13outdoors.html HH
Interesting......wonder if we will actually see it on the market....also wonder what would happen to it if it fell in the water  lol
Wonder why they would use Scandium it is fairly rare and expensive and demand out weighs production. As far as a rod bending like they claim who cares I don`t bend mine like that.
They are already on the market and they're expensive. Starting at 325 pounds. http://www.spinfish.co.uk/news24carrotfishingrods.html

I wonder if it attracts rabbits?  Playboy Bunnies would be nicer.  Hey, douG can't you come up with one from cucumbers for the muskie guys?  I'd be afraid to own one .... sometimes they sit in the rack so long waiting for me to get out, they would take root.

e21 is a Toronto based company.  Big into golf and getting in to fishing.  They won some awards down at ICAST which is the fishing industry's manufacturer showcase/symposium.  Sometimes thinking outside the box is necessary for evolutionary leaps in product improvement.  Time will tell if this is one of those or not.  Charles
At 700 bucks a pop they can keep their voodoo science and I will keep Shimano`s and their lifetime warranty!
I want!  I wonder if you get hungry if you could take a bite out of it?  hahahahaha
